channel.title: Starting MoparScape with Batch File
channel.description:
How do I start moparscape (lithiumscape IP) with batch file?
when i click on runMoparScape.bat, a black box appears that says: Exception in thread"main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:Bot Press any key to continue... When I press any key it just disappears.
I AM logged into Hamachi on the server if i can acces Lithiumscape.
Thanks (im new to private servers)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 19, 2006, 12:21:23 PM[/size][hr]Please help me i wish to get started.
